mapper.update: update food set eat_cnt = eat_cnt + 1 where code = #{foodCode}
mapper.select: select e.* from usereat e, food f where e.food_code = f.code and e.user_id=#{id}
select f.* from usereat e, food f where e.user_id = #{id} and e.food_code = f.code and f.name like #{pattern}
select f.* from usereat e, food f where e.user_id = #{id} and e.food_code = f.code and f.material like #{pattern}
select f.* from usereat e, food f where e.user_id = #{id} and e.food_code = f.code and f.maker like #{pattern}

select substr(eat_date,1,10) dates, sum(carbo) carbo, sum(protein) protein, sum(fat) fat, sum(sugar) sugar , sum(natrium) natrium, sum(chole) chole, sum(fattyacid) fattyacid, sum(transfat) transfat from food f, usereat u where f.code = u.food_code and u.user_id = #{p_userId} and substr(eat_date,1,10) between #{p_srtDate} and #{p_endDate} group by substr(eat_date,1,10)

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(eat_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(eat_date)-1) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as start, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(eat_date, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(eat_date)-7) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as end, DATE_FORMAT(eat_date, '%Y%u') AS dates , sum(carbo) carbo, sum(protein) protein, sum(fat) fat, sum(sugar) sugar , sum(natrium) natrium, sum(chole) chole, sum(fattyacid) fattyacid, sum(transfat) transfat from food f, usereat u where f.code = u.food_code and u.user_id = #{userId} and substr(eat_date,1,10) between #{srtDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY dates

select substr(eat_date,1,7) dates, sum(carbo) carbo, sum(protein) protein, sum(fat) fat, sum(sugar) sugar , sum(natrium) natrium, sum(chole) chole, sum(fattyacid) fattyacid, sum(transfat) transfat from food f, usereat e where f.code = e.food_code and u.user_id = #{userId} and substr(eat_date,1,10) between #{srtDate} and #{endDate} group by substr(eat_date,1,7)
